i work at mcdonald s.
I'm a busy person with a lot of demands on my time.
I value my friends the most.
i m a mom with two sons and a husband.

participant_2.background:
I had to give up my job to take care of my health.
I want to be able to combine my two passions, football and technology, by creating a wearable device that can track my performance on the pitch.
i m the lead singer for an indie band.
I have a soft spot for stuffed animals, and I'd love to get one for my baby's nursery.
i am a stay at home mom.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there!
What do you like to do for fun?
I'm a stay at home mom, so I like to spend time with my family and friends. I also love to sing and play music.
That sounds great! I'm a busy mom, too, so I cherish my time with my family and friends. I also love to cook and bake.
I love to cook and bake too! I'm actually the lead singer for an indie band.
Wow, that's so cool! I've always wanted to sing in a band.
It's a lot of fun! I'm hoping to combine my two passions, football and technology, by creating a wearable device that can track my performance on the pitch.
That's a great idea! I'm sure you'll be successful.
Thanks! I appreciate it.
No problem! So, what are your favorite stuffed animals?
I love all stuffed animals, but I have a soft spot for teddy bears.
Me too! I have a teddy bear that I've had since I was a little girl.
That's so sweet! I love those kinds of memories.
Me too. They're the best.
So, what are you looking for in a friend?
I'm looking for someone who is kind, funny, and supportive. I also want someone who is interested in similar things to me, like music and baking.
Sounds like we have a lot in common! I'm definitely interested in being friends.
Great! I'd love to be friends.
Me too!
